Rules for the game:

 1. The game consists of 10 questions.

 2. The complexity of questions increases as you progress.

 3. Each question will have a designated time limit within which you must provide your answer and proceed to the next question.

 4. If you select your answer but fail to submit it, the game will end for you.

 5. Submitting a wrong answer will also result in the termination of your game.

 

 Keep playing for exciting gifts and discounts.
